channel.title: dunst on Notes
channel.description: Read the latest dunst on Notes

item.title: Prevent dunst from autostarting using DBus
item.description: By default, dunst is autostarted by DBus. This can be turned off by editing /usr/share/dbus-1/services/org.knopwob.dunst.service and changing Exec=/usr/bin/dunst To: Exec=/usr/bin/true Source: https://lists.archlinux.org/pipermail/arch-general/2015-January/038282.html
item.content:encoded:
By default, dunst is autostarted by DBus. This can be turned off by editing /usr/share/dbus-1/services/org.knopwob.dunst.service and changing

Exec=/usr/bin/dunst

To:

Exec=/usr/bin/true

Source:
https://lists.archlinux.org/pipermail/arch-general/2015-January/038282.html
